item.title: @elonmusk: "The United States of America has successfully carried out a large scale strike against Venezuela an...
item.description: "The United States of America has successfully carried out a large scale strike against Venezuela and its leader, President Nicolas Maduro, who has been, along with his wife, captured and flown out of the Country. This operation was done in conjunction with U.S. Law Enforcement. Details to follow. There will be a News Conference today at 11 A.M., at Mar-a-Lago. Thank you for your attention to this matter! President DONALD J. TRUMP"

item.title: @elonmusk: The president offered multiple off ramps, but was very clear throughout this process: the drug traff...
item.description: The president offered multiple off ramps, but was very clear throughout this process: the drug trafficking must stop, and the stolen oil must be returned to the United States. Maduro is the newest person to find out that President Trump means what he says. Kudos to our brave special operators who pulled off a truly impressive operation.

item.title: @elonmusk: Congratulations, President Trump! This is a win for the world and a clear message to evil dictators ...
item.description: Congratulations, President Trump! This is a win for the world and a clear message to evil dictators everywhere.

What a MIC DROP from Marco Rubio ğŸ«³ğŸ¤ "The Constitution does not say you elect the President and then you put in place a State Department to undermine the President if the person who's the Secretary of State doesn't agree with him. That's ridiculous. That's STUPID, REALLY!" "At the end of the day, the person the people of the United States elected to be the President of the United States and the Commander-in-Chief is Donald J. Trump. That's who they elected. And MY job, and the job of the people in our administration, is to implement the PRESIDENT'S foreign policy." "Why people think that somehow foreign policy can be divorced from our republic? That's not the way our Constitution WORKS." "I don't know why anybody would think that. So that's the job I have, and that's the job I'm proud to do. I think we've made a lot of progress." MAGA LOVES MARCO! ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸

item.title: @elonmusk: For years, the globalist establishment preached appeasement while a NARCO-TERRORIST turned Venezuela...
item.description: For years, the globalist establishment preached appeasement while a NARCO-TERRORIST turned Venezuela into a criminal outpost. That era of weakness, is OVER. President Trump just delivered the ultimate justice: Maduro is in custody. A massive victory for the rule of law and American STRENGTH. The free ride for dictators is finished.
